name: Chimeric Cat

trait.name: Keen Smell
text: The cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 slashing damage.

description:
The chimeric cat has antennae that grant it blindsight and tremorsense out to a range of 60 feet
Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden p. 246
